info.title: Web API - Testing With Mock Models

get.summary: Retrieves Account info for the current authenticated user (contact).
get.description: Authentication and Authorization will be supported in the future.

400.description: Contact ID is missing or wrong

get.summary: Retrieves Account info by contact (person) ID.

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: Contact (person) ID. For testing use, for example, 10000000 or 51084908).

400.description: Contact ID is missing or wrong

get.summary: Add-ons by MSISDN.
get.description:
NOTE: Add-On SKU should be used to retrieve the following properties from CMS:
  • Title
  • Image URL
  • Description

parameters.name: msisdnEncrypted
parameters.description: Unique Service Identifier i.e. MSISDN (encrypted). For testing use a Phone Number (for example, 5555550000).

get.summary: Retrieves auto payment information by MSISDN.

parameters.name: msisdnEncrypted
parameters.description: Unique Service Identifier i.e. MSISDN (encrypted). For testing use a Phone Number (for example, 5555550000).

403.description: Forbidden: selected MSISDN does not belong to the Contact

get.summary: Retrieves specific balance details by MSISDN.
get.description:
NOTE #1: For Postpaid account the Balance value contains amount due (zero or negative). For Prepaid account the Balance shows the actual balance available. NOTE #2: If you need to download an invoice PDF file please perform the following steps.
  1. [CURRENT] GET request to the Balance API with an encrypted MSISDN (use 5555550000 for testing) and retrieve the balance details info. For the next step you will need the same encrypted MSISDN (5555550000) and the retrieved invoiceFile as an encrypted file path.
  2. GET request with MSISDN and invoiceFile to the Bills API and retrieve the following URL building parameters: key and timeStamp. Now you have 4 parameters for the final step: MSISDN, path (invoiceFile), key, timeStamp.
  3. GET request with the 4 received parameters to the Bills API and download a PDF file.

parameters.name: msisdnEncrypted
parameters.description: Unique Service Identifier i.e. MSISDN (encrypted). For testing use a Phone Number (for example, 5555550000).

403.description: Forbidden: selected MSISDN does not belong to the Contact

get.summary: Retrieves building parameters to download a bill PDF file.
get.description:
NOTE: If you need to download an invoice PDF file please perform the following steps.
  1. GET request to the Balance API with an encrypted MSISDN (use 5555550000 for testing) and retrieve the balance details info. For the next step you will need the same encrypted MSISDN (5555550000) and the retrieved invoiceFile as an encrypted file path.
  2. [CURRENT] GET request with MSISDN and invoiceFile to the Bills API and retrieve the following URL building parameters: key and timeStamp. Now you have 4 parameters for the final step: MSISDN, path (invoiceFile), key, timeStamp.
  3. GET request with the 4 received parameters to the Bills API and download a PDF file.

parameters.name: msisdnEncrypted
parameters.description: Unique Service Identifier i.e. MSISDN (encrypted). For testing use a Phone Number (for example, 5555550000).

parameters.name: fileParamsEncrypted
parameters.description: Encrypted parameters of the bill file.

403.description: Forbidden: selected MSISDN does not belong to the Contact

get.summary: Downloads the Invoice PDF file by pre-generated parameters.
get.description:
NOTE: If you need to download an invoice PDF file please perform the following steps.
  1. GET request to the Balance API with an encrypted MSISDN (use 5555550000 for testing) and retrieve the balance details info. For the next step you will need the same encrypted MSISDN (5555550000) and the retrieved invoiceFile as an encrypted file path.
  2. GET request with MSISDN and invoiceFile to the Bills API and retrieve the following URL building parameters: key and timeStamp. Now you have 4 parameters for the final step: MSISDN, path (invoiceFile), key, timeStamp.
  3. [CURRENT] GET request with the 4 received parameters to the Bills API and download a PDF file.

parameters.name: msisdnEncrypted
parameters.description: Unique Service Identifier i.e. MSISDN (encrypted). For testing use a Phone Number (for example, 5555550000).

parameters.name: fileParamsEncrypted
parameters.description: Encrypted parameters of the bill file.

parameters.name: keyEncrypted
parameters.description: Encrypted key.

parameters.name: timestampEncrypted
parameters.description: Encrypted timestamp

post.summary: Check if the provided IMEI is valid for the selected MSISDN.

parameters.name: msisdnEncrypted
parameters.description: Unique Service Identifier i.e. MSISDN (encrypted). For testing use a Phone Number (for example, 5555550000)

parameters.name: imeiInfo
parameters.description: IMEI in JSON format

200.description: Successful response with info about Device compatibility

400.description: One or more input parameters are invalid: MSISDN, IMEI

404.description: Resource not found by MSISDN and IMEI

get.summary: Mobile plan information by MSISDN.
get.description:
NOTE: Successful result contains a Plan SKU that should be used to retrieve the following plan properties from CMS:
  • Title
  • Image URL
  • Price
  • Description
  • Plan Summary
  • URL
  • Type
  • Sort Rank
  • Rate Plan Type
  • Tags
